name: @RetinoProc
author: AFNI Developers
description: A script to process retinotopic FMRI data, using AFNI's 3dRetinoPhase and SurfRetinMap.

inputs.description: Input time series dataset for counterclockwise stimulus
inputs.name: Counterclockwise time series

inputs.description: Input time series dataset for clockwise stimulus
inputs.name: Clockwise time series

inputs.description: Input time series dataset for expanding stimulus
inputs.name: Expanding time series

inputs.description: Input time series dataset for contracting stimulus
inputs.name: Contracting time series

inputs.description: Specify a volume from the EPI time series to which all EPI volumes are aligned
inputs.name: EPI Reference Volume

inputs.description: Specify a volume from the EPI time series that is better suited for aligning the T1 to it than EpiRef might be
inputs.name: EPI Anatomical Reference Volume

inputs.description: T1 volume acquired during the same session as the retinotopic scans
inputs.name: Anatomical Volume

inputs.description: Anatomical volume aligned to EPI reference
inputs.name: Aligned Anatomical Volume

inputs.description: Surface Volume for the cortical surfaces
inputs.name: Surface Volume

inputs.description: Surface volume aligned to experiment's EPI data
inputs.name: Aligned Surface Volume

inputs.description: Use phase of fundamental frequency to estimate latency
inputs.name: Phase Estimation Flag

inputs.description: Use delay relative to reference time series to estimate latency
inputs.name: Delay Estimation Flag

inputs.description: TR, in seconds, of retinotopic scans
inputs.name: TR

inputs.description: Period, in seconds, of eccentricity stimuli
inputs.name: Period (Eccentricity)

inputs.description: Period, in seconds, of polar angle stimuli
inputs.name: Period (Polar Angle)

inputs.description: Duration, in seconds, before eccentricity stimulus
inputs.name: Pre-Eccentricity Stimulus Duration

inputs.description: Duration, in seconds, before polar angle stimulus
inputs.name: Pre-Polar Angle Stimulus Duration

inputs.description: Number of stimulation blocks and duration of stimulation for eccentricity stimulus
inputs.name: On Eccentricity Stimulus

inputs.description: Number of stimulation blocks and duration of stimulation for polar angle stimulus
inputs.name: On Polar Angle Stimulus

inputs.description: Multiple on durations for eccentricity stimulus
inputs.name: Variable On Eccentricity

inputs.description: Multiple on durations for polar angle stimulus
inputs.name: Variable On Polar Angle

inputs.description: Number of wedges in polar stimulus
inputs.name: Number of Wedges

inputs.description: Number of rings in eccentricity stimulus
inputs.name: Number of Rings

inputs.description: Target smoothness for polar stimulus
inputs.name: FWHM Polar

inputs.description: Target smoothness for eccentricity stimulus
inputs.name: FWHM Eccentricity

inputs.description: Ignore volumes from the beginning of each time series
inputs.name: Ignore Volumes

inputs.description: Do not correct for slice timing
inputs.name: No Slice Timing Correction

inputs.description: Spec file for left hemisphere
inputs.name: Left Hemisphere Spec

inputs.description: Spec file for right hemisphere
inputs.name: Right Hemisphere Spec

inputs.description: Detrend time series using columns in ORT1D file
inputs.name: Detrend ORT File

inputs.description: Detrend time series for counterclockwise stimulus
inputs.name: Detrend ORT for CCW

inputs.description: Detrend time series for clockwise stimulus
inputs.name: Detrend ORT for CLW

inputs.description: Detrend time series for expanding stimulus
inputs.name: Detrend ORT for EXP

inputs.description: Detrend time series for contracting stimulus
inputs.name: Detrend ORT for CON

inputs.description: SID is a flag identifying the subject
inputs.name: Subject ID

inputs.description: Directory where processing results are to be stored
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: Turn on the command echoing to help with debugging script failure
inputs.name: Echo Command Flag

inputs.description: Turn on command echoing for certain programs only
inputs.name: Educational Echo Command Flag

inputs.description: Pass options to @SUMA_AlignToExperiment script
inputs.name: A2E Options

inputs.description: Pass options to align_epi_anat.py
inputs.name: AEA Options
